name: Space Rocket
description:
Set off to conquer space with Space Rocket, an ultra addictive rocket game!
Your mission is to propel your rocket as high as possible, without exploding it in full flight! Each successful takeoff will bring you pieces that you can use to improve your rocket, or even unlock new colors.



Features:

■ Pretty decorations!
■ Improved rocket!
■ Send the inhabitants in March!
■ Addictive gameplay!
■ Unlock new colors for your rocket!
